snippet: Economic activity expanded in nine of the nation’s 12 districts, the Fed said in its Beige Book report of anecdotal information on business activity.
abstract: Federal Reserve's Beige Book report indicates economic activity rose in nine of country's 12 districts.
lead_paragraph: Economic activity expanded in nine of the nation’s 12 districts, the Fed said in its Beige Book report of anecdotal information on business activity.

headline.main: Fed Report Shows Modest Growth in Many U.S. Areas
headline.print_headline: Fed Report Shows Modest, Uneven Growth, With Outlook Mostly Positive
